3_RP-T.title: Resident Pass-Talent (RP-T)
3_RP-T.description: Resident Pass-Talent (RP-T) offers talented expatriates permission to work and stay in Malaysia for up to 10 years! RP-T was first introduced in 2011, with the aim to attract and retain top talent in the country.

1_Student Pass.title: Student Pass
1_Student Pass.description: Student Pass is a type of visa issued to foreign students who are enrolled in an educational institution in Malaysia at the primary, secondary, or tertiary level.

2_Guardian Pass.title: Guardian Pass
2_Guardian Pass.description: Guardian Pass is a type of visa issued to a foreigner who is a parent or guardian of a foreign student studying in Malaysia.
